channel.title: Cancel button when d/l maps
channel.description:
When connecting to a server and say you find out that the server host has set a 52 mb map without a fastdownload file server, you would need to be able to quit/cancel. Rather than alt/tab/del out.
Thanks

item.title: Cancel button when d/l maps
item.description:
When connecting to a server and say you find out that the server host has set a 52 mb map
without a fastdownload file server, you would need to be able to quit/cancel. Rather than alt/tab/del out.

Thanks
